short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the 'en-us' update date of Microsoft Learn pages and highlights it if the current language version is outdated.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Display the date of the latest update at learn.microsoft.com/*/
learn.microsoft.com/*/ で最新更新日付を表示する
